text:
[Verse]
Stars are shining bright sky
Whispers in the night fly
Heartbeats in the moon's glow
Dancing shadows soft and slow

[Verse 2]
City lights are far away
Dreams come out to softly play
Lonely streets are silent now
In the dark we take a vow

[Chorus]
Midnight whispers call my name
Every night it's just the same
Close your eyes and hear the sound
In this dream we are unbound

[Verse 3]
Night birds singing sweet tune
Breeze is chilly under moon
Footsteps echo hearts beat fast
Silhouettes that seem to last

[Bridge]
Whispers soft within the breeze
Midnight secrets none can freeze
Eyes that sparkle dreams that gleam
Lost in midnight's tender dream

[Chorus]
Midnight whispers call my name
Every night it's just the same
Close your eyes and hear the sound
In this dream we are unbound
title: Midnight Whisper
